property.name: ACTIVATION_SUCCESS_TEXT
property.value: Your request has been received. You will be activated in the next 24 hours. Call 123 and say 'Caller Tunes' to make your selections

property.name: ACTIVATION_FAILURE_TEXT
property.value: You are already active on 'Caller Tunes'. Please call 123 and say 'Caller Tunes' to select your tunes.

property.name: DEACTIVATION_SUCCESS_TEXT
property.value: Your request has been received. You will be deactivated in the next 24 hours

property.name: DEACTIVATION_FAILURE_TEXT
property.value: You have not yet subscribed to 'Caller Tunes'. To subscribe send ACT CT as an SMS to 123

property.name: ERROR_TEXT
property.value: You are not subscribed to 'Caller Tunes'.

property.name: HELP_TEXT
property.value: To subscribe, type ACT CT and SMS to 123. To unsubscribe, type DEACT CT and SMS to 123

property.name: INVALID_PREFIX_TEXT
property.value: You are not authorized to use the 'Caller Tunes' service. We apologize the inconvenience

property.name: TECHNICAL_FAILURE_TEXT
property.value: I am sorry, we are having some technical difficulties. Please try later
